body_html: This should also be the case. In fact, when I replace the 'while' loop with a written out single iteration (equivalent in the case that I test), the code works fine forwards and backwards. So I would assume there is something to do with using the TensorArray's inside the while loop that is causing issues.

body: This should also be the case.  In fact, when I replace the 'while' loop with a written out single iteration (equivalent in the case that I test), the code works fine forwards and backwards.  So I would assume there is something to do with using the TensorArray's inside the while loop that is causing issues.
